name: Setquence!
description:
Setquence! is a game about connecting two different cards by filling in the spaces in between.

To play, find a sequence of cards that transition between the start and end cards by changing only one attribute at a time.

Click a card in your hand (the lower, red zone) to move it to leftmost empty spot in the tableau.  It will only go if it's allowed in that spot.

Click a card (except the ends) in the tableau to remove it an everything to its right.

Harder difficulties have more complex mazes, with longer solutions, among more elaborate cards.

Inspired by the classic card game SET.

Made for the 2023 Löve Jam.
